item.title: Lane Detection
item.description: Lane detection using OpenCV for self-driving cars.

item.title: Movie Recommendation System
item.description: Built a website to give movie recommendations.

item.title: PiHole
item.description: A network-level advertisement and Internet tracker blocking application using Raspberry Pi 3.

item.title: Smart Car UROP
item.description: An automatic car using Arduino, IR sensors, ultrasonic sensors, and a camera.

item.title: XToPDF
item.description: Conversion of .jpg, .txt files to PDF using Java.

item.title: StudentChain (UC Berkeley)
item.description: Using Blockchain technology to prevent misuse of student discounts. The project was done in the Blockchain Challenge Lab at UC Berkeley. Led this project which became one of the best projects of the class.

item.title: Tutor Finder (CalHacks - UC Berkeley)
item.description: Created and trained a chatbot using Landbot to help a student find tutors on an online tutoring platform.

item.title: Roadster (UC Berkeley)
item.description: Drawbot made from scratch that moves and creates random colorful patterns in circular shapes. Used Arduino Uno, servos, and laser-cut lineages to hold the color pencils.
